name: Edwin VanCleef
descr: Combo: Gain +2/+2 for each card played earlier this turn.
flavorText: He led the Stonemasons in the reconstruction of Stormwind, and when the nobles refused to pay, he founded the Defias Brotherhood to, well, deconstruct Stormwind.

name: Perdition's Blade
descr: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage. Combo: Deal 2 instead.
flavorText: Perdition\'s Blade is Ragnaros\'s back-up weapon while Sulfuras is in the shop.

name: Bloodsail Raider
descr: Battlecry: Gain Attack equal to the Attack of your weapon.
flavorText: "I only plunder on days that end in \'y\'."

name: Bloodmage Thalnos
descr: Spell Damage +1. Deathrattle: Draw a card.
flavorText: He\'s in charge of the Annual Scarlet Monastery Blood Drive!

name: Wisp
flavorText: If you hit an Eredar Lord with enough Wisps, it will explode.   But why?

name: Sen'jin Shieldmasta
descr: Taunt
flavorText: Sen\'jin Villiage is nice, if you like trolls and dust.

name: Totemic Might
descr: Give your Totems +2 Health.
flavorText: Totem-stomping is no longer recommended.

name: Dragonling Mechanic
descr: Battlecry: Summon a 2/1 Mechanical Dragonling.
flavorText: She is still working on installing the rocket launcher add-on for Mr. Bitey.

name: Mogu'shan Warden
descr: Taunt
flavorText: All these guys ever do is talk about the Thunder King.   BOOOORRRINNG!

name: Hungry Crab
descr: Battlecry: Destroy a Murloc and gain +2/+2.
flavorText: Murloc.  It\'s what\'s for dinner.

name: Misdirection
descr: Secret: When a character attacks your hero, instead he attacks another random character.
flavorText: Sometimes it\'s as simple as putting on a fake mustache and pointing at someone else.

name: Patient Assassin
descr: Stealth. Destroy any minion damaged by this minion.
flavorText: He’s not really that patient. It just takes a while for someone to walk by that he can actually reach.

name: Violet Teacher
descr: Whenever you cast a spell, summon a 1/1 Violet Apprentice.
flavorText: If you don\'t pay attention, you may be turned into a pig.  And then you get your name on the board.

name: Arathi Weaponsmith
descr: Battlecry: Equip a 2/2 weapon.
flavorText: 50% off fist weapons, limited time only!

name: Acolyte of Pain
descr: Whenever this minion takes damage, draw a card.
flavorText: He trained when he was younger to be an acolyte of joy, but things didn’t work out like he thought they would.

name: Holy Nova
descr: Deal 2 damage to all enemies.  Restore 2 Health to all  friendly characters.
flavorText: If the Holy Light forsakes you, good luck casting this spell.  Also, you\'re probably a jerk.

name: Commanding Shout
descr: Your minions can't be reduced below 1 Health this turn.  Draw a card.
flavorText: "Shout! Shout! Let it all out!" - Advice to warriors-in-training

name: Unbound Elemental
descr: Whenever you play a card with Overload, gain +1/+1.
flavorText: Unlike bound elementals, Unbound ones really enjoy a night on the town.

name: Blessing of Might
descr: Give a minion +3 Attack.
flavorText: "As in, you MIGHT want to get out of my way." - Toad Mackle, recently buffed.

name: Blessing of Kings
descr: Give a minion +4/+4. (+4 Attack/+4 Health)
flavorText: Given the number of kings who have been assassinated, are you sure you want their blessing?

name: Polymorph
descr: Transform a minion into a 1/1 Sheep.
flavorText: There was going to be a pun in this flavor text, but it just came out baa-d.

name: Dark Iron Dwarf
descr: Attack buff only lasts until the end of turn.
flavorText: Guardians of Dark Iron Ore.    Perhaps the most annoying ore, given where you have to forge it.

name: Charge
descr: Give a friendly minion +2 Attack and Charge.
flavorText: "Guys! Guys! Slow down!" - some kind of non-warrior minion

name: Stampeding Kodo
descr: Battlecry: Destroy a random enemy minion with 2 or less Attack.
flavorText: This Kodo is so big that he can stampede by himself.

name: Humility
descr: Change a minion's Attack to 1.
flavorText: This card makes something really damp.  Oh wait.  That\'s "Humidity."

name: Gruul
descr: At the end of each turn, gain +1/+1 .
flavorText: He\'s Gruul "the Dragonkiller".  He just wanted to cuddle them… he never meant to…

name: Mark of the Wild
descr: Give a minion Taunt and +2/+2. (+2 Attack/+2 Health)
flavorText: Not to be confused with Jim of the Wild.

name: Worgen Infiltrator
descr: Stealth
flavorText: If you want to stop a worgen from infiltrating, just yell, "No! Bad boy!"

name: Frostbolt
descr: Deal 3 damage to a character and Freeze it.
flavorText: It is customary to yell "Chill out!" or "Freeze!" or "Ice ice, baby!" when you play this card.

name: Flametongue Totem
descr: Adjacent minions have +2 Attack.
flavorText: Totemsmiths like to use the rarest woods for their totems.  There are even rumors of totems made of Ironbark Protectors.

name: Assassinate
descr: Destroy an enemy minion.
flavorText: If you don\'t want to be assassinated, move to the Barrens and change your name. Good luck!

name: Lord of the Arena
descr: Taunt
flavorText: He used to be a 2100+ rated arena player, but that was years ago and nobody can get him to shut up about it.

name: Injured Blademaster
descr: Battlecry: Deal 4 damage to HIMSELF.
flavorText: He claims it is an old war wound, but we think he just cut himself shaving.

name: Siphon Soul
descr: Destroy a minion. Restore 3 Health to your hero.
flavorText: You probably should avoid siphoning your own soul.  You might create some kind of weird infinite loop.

name: Lay on Hands
descr: Restore 8 Health. Draw 3 cards.
flavorText: A grammatically awkward life saver.

name: Silvermoon Guardian
descr: Divine Shield
flavorText: The first time they tried to guard Silvermoon against the scourge, it didn’t go so well…

name: Mind Vision
descr: Put a copy of a random card in your opponent's hand into your hand.
flavorText: I see what you did there.

name: Core Hound
flavorText: You don’t tame a Core Hound. You just train it to eat someone else before it eats you.

name: Grimscale Oracle
descr: ALL other Murlocs have +1 Attack.
flavorText: These are the brainy murlocs.  It turns out that doesn’t mean much.

name: Lightning Storm
descr: Deal 2-3 damage to all enemy minions. Overload: (2)
flavorText: An umbrella won\'t be effective, I\'m afraid.

name: Lightwell
descr: At the start of your turn, restore 3 Health to a damaged friendly character.
flavorText: It isn\'t clear if people ignore the Lightwell, or if it is just invisible.

name: Coldlight Seer
descr: Battlecry: Give ALL other Murlocs +2 Health.
flavorText: The Coldlight murlocs reside in the darkest pits of the Abyssal Depths.  So no, there\'s no getting away from murlocs.

name: Gorehowl
descr: Attacking a minion costs 1 Attack instead of 1 Durability.
flavorText: Grommash Hellscream\'s famous axe.  Somehow this ended up in Prince Malchezaar\'s possession.  Quite the mystery!

name: Far Sight
descr: Draw a card. That card costs (3) less.
flavorText: Drek\'thar can\'t see, but he can see. You know what I mean? It\'s ok if you don\'t.

name: Chillwind Yeti
flavorText: He always dreamed of coming down from the mountains and opening a noodle shop, but he never got the nerve.

name: Moonfire
descr: Deal 1 damage.
flavorText: "Cast Moonfire, and never stop." - How to Be a Druid, Chapter 5, Section 3

name: Blade Flurry
descr: Destroy your weapon and deal its damage to all enemies.
flavorText: "Look, it\'s not just about waving daggers around really fast.  It\'s a lot more complicated than that." - Shan, Rogue Trainer

name: Mass Dispel
descr: Silence all enemy minions. Draw a card.
flavorText: It dispels buffs, powers, hopes, and dreams.

name: Crazed Alchemist
descr: Battlecry: Swap the Attack and Health of a minion.
flavorText: "You\'ll love my new recipe!" he says... especially if you\'re not happy with your current number of limbs.

name: Shadow Madness
descr: Gain control of an enemy minion with 3 or less Attack until end of turn.
flavorText: You can rationalize it all you want, it\'s still a mean thing to do.

name: Equality
descr: Change the Health of ALL minions to 1.
flavorText: We are all special unique snowflakes... with 1 Health.

name: Alarm-o-Bot
descr: At the start of your turn, swap this minion with a random one in your hand.
flavorText: WARNING.  WARNING.  WARNING.

name: Animal Companion
descr: Summon a random Beast Companion.
flavorText: You could summon Misha, Leokk, or Huffer!  Huffer is more trouble than he\'s worth.

name: Young Priestess
descr: At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +1 Health.
flavorText: She can\'t wait to learn Power Word: Fortitude Rank 2.

name: Gadgetzan Auctioneer
descr: Whenever you cast a spell, draw a card.
flavorText: He used to run the black market auction house, but there was just too much violence and he had to move.

name: Starfall
descr: Choose One - Deal 5 damage to a minion; or 2 damage to all enemy minions.
flavorText: Is the sky falling?  Yes.  Yes it is.

name: Cone of Cold
descr: Freeze a minion and the minions next to it, and deal 1 damage to them.
flavorText: Magi of the Kirin Tor were casting Cubes of Cold for many years before Cones came into fashion some 90 years ago.

name: Earth Shock
descr: Silence a minion, then deal 1 damage to it.
flavorText: Earth Shock? Shouldn\'t it be "Azeroth Shock"?

name: Tirion Fordring
descr: Divine Shield. Taunt. Deathrattle: Equip a 5/3 Ashbringer.
flavorText: If you haven\'t heard the Tirion Fordring theme song, it\'s because it doesn\'t exist.

name: Ironfur Grizzly
descr: Taunt
flavorText: "Bear Carcass 1/10"

name: Headcrack
descr: Deal 2 damage to the enemy hero. Combo: Return this to your hand next turn.
flavorText: When all else fails, nothing beats a swift whack upside the head.

name: Arcane Shot
descr: Deal 2 damage.
flavorText: Magi conjured arcane arrows to sell to hunters, until hunters learned just enough magic to do it themselves.  The resulting loss of jobs sent Stormwind into a minor recession.

name: Void Terror
descr: Battlecry: Destroy the minions on either side of this minion and gain their Attack and Health.
flavorText: If you put this into your deck, you WILL lose the trust of your other minions.

name: Mortal Coil
descr: Deal 1 damage to a minion. If that kills it, draw a card.
flavorText: If your spells look like horrifying skulls, let\'s be honest, you should get to draw some cards.

name: Execute
descr: Destroy a damaged enemy minion.
flavorText: It\'s okay, he deserved it.

name: Bloodlust
descr: Give your minions +3 Attack this turn.
flavorText: blaarghghLLGHRHARAAHAHHH!!

name: Kidnapper
descr: Combo: Return a minion to its owner's hand.
flavorText: He just wants people to see his vacation photos.

name: Old Murk-Eye
descr: Charge. Has +1 Attack for each other Murloc on the battlefield.
flavorText: He\'s a legend among murlocs.  "Mrghllghghllghg!", they say.

name: Backstab
descr: Deal 2 damage to an undamaged minion.
flavorText: It\'s funny how often yelling "Look over there!" gets your opponent to turn around.

name: Murloc Warleader
descr: ALL other Murlocs have +2/+1.
flavorText: Do Murlocs ever get tired of making the same old sound?  Nope!  Mrglglrglglglglglglgl!

name: Shadowstep
descr: Return a friendly minion to your hand. It costs (2) less.
flavorText: Rogue dance troops will sometimes Shadowstep away at the end of a performance.  Crowds love it.

name: Ancestral Spirit
descr: Choose a minion. When that minion is destroyed, return it to the battlefield.
flavorText: It was just a flesh wound.

name: Defender of Argus
descr: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions +1/+1 and Taunt.
flavorText: You wouldn’t think that Argus would need this much defending.   But it does.

name: Assassin's Blade
flavorText: Guaranteed to have been owned by a real assassin.   Certificate of authenticity included.

name: Big Game Hunter
descr: Battlecry: Destroy a minion with an Attack of 7 or more.
flavorText: Mere devilsaurs no longer excite him.  Soon he\'ll be trying to catch Onyxia with only a dull Krol Blade.

name: Aldor Peacekeeper
descr: Battlecry: Change an enemy minion's Attack to 1.
flavorText: The Aldor hate two things: the Scryers and smooth jazz.

name: Blizzard
descr: Deal 2 damage to all enemy minions and Freeze them.
flavorText: This spell can be very Entertaining.

name: Unleash the Hounds
descr: For each enemy minion, summon a 1/1 Hound with Charge.
flavorText: You must read the name of this card out loud each time you play it.

name: Sap
descr: Return an enemy minion to your opponent's hand.
flavorText: Rogues love sappy movies.

name: Gnomish Inventor
descr: Battlecry: Draw a card.
flavorText: She\'s never quite sure what she\'s making, she just knows it\'s AWESOME!

name: Mind Control
descr: Take control of an enemy minion.
flavorText: Nominated as "Spell Most Likely to Make Your Opponent Punch the Wall."

name: Ravenholdt Assassin
descr: Stealth
flavorText: Just mail him a package with a name and 10,000 gold.  He\'ll take care of the rest.

name: Ice Lance
descr: Freeze a character. If it was already Frozen, deal 4 damage instead.
flavorText: The trick is not to break the lance.  Otherwise, you have "Ice Pieces."  Ice Pieces aren\'t as effective.

name: Acidic Swamp Ooze
descr: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's weapon.
flavorText: Oozes love Flamenco.   Don\'t ask.

name: Blessed Champion
descr: Double a minion's Attack.
flavorText: This card causes double the trouble AND double the fun.

name: Savannah Highmane
descr: Deathrattle: Summon two 2/2 Hyenas.
flavorText: In the jungle, the mighty jungle, the lion gets slowly consumed by hyenas.

name: Dire Wolf Alpha
descr: Adjacent minions have +1 Attack.
flavorText: We are pretty excited about the upcoming release of Dire Wolf Beta, just repost this sign for a chance at a key.

name: Blessing of Wisdom
descr: Choose a minion.  Whenever it attacks, draw a card.
flavorText: Apparently with wisdom comes the knowledge that you should probably be attacking every turn.

name: Abusive Sergeant
descr: Battlecry: Give a minion +2 Attack until the end of turn.
flavorText: ADD ME TO YOUR DECK, MAGGOT!

name: Sylvanas Windrunner
descr: Deathrattle: Take control of a random enemy minion.
flavorText: Sylvanas was turned into the Banshee Queen by Arthas, but he probably should have just killed her because it just pissed her off.

name: Cruel Taskmaster
descr: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to a minion and give it +2 Attack.
flavorText: "I\'m going to need you to come in on Sunday." - Cruel Taskmaster

name: Lightning Bolt
descr: Deal 3 damage. Overload: (1)
flavorText: Lightning Bolt! Lightning Bolt! Lightning Bolt!

name: Keeper of the Grove
descr: Choose One - Deal 2 damage; or Silence a minion.
flavorText: These guys just show up and start Keeping your Groves without even asking.

name: Multi-Shot
descr: Deal 3 damage to two random enemy minions.
flavorText: You see, it\'s all about throughput.

name: Pint-Sized Summoner
descr: The first minion you play each turn costs (1) less.
flavorText: She\'s quite jealous of the Gallon-Sized Summoner.

name: Spellbreaker
descr: Battlecry: Silence a minion.
flavorText: Spellbreakers can rip enchantments from magic-wielders.  The process is painless and can be performed on an outpatient basis.

name: Deadly Poison
descr: Give your weapon +2 Attack.
flavorText: Rogues guard the secrets to poison-making carefully, lest magi start incorporating poison into their spells.  Poisonbolt? Rain of Poison?  Poison Elemental?  Nobody wants that.

name: Fan of Knives
descr: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions. Draw a card.
flavorText: I wouldn\'t say I LOVE knives, but I\'m definitely a fan.

name: Shieldbearer
descr: Taunt
flavorText: Have you seen the size of the shields in this game??  This is no easy job.

name: Sense Demons
descr: Put 2 random Demons from your deck into your hand.
flavorText: Generally demons are pretty obvious and you don’t need a spell to sense them.

name: Shield Block
descr: Gain 5 Armor.  Draw a card.
flavorText: Shields were invented because Face Block is USELESS.

name: Ancient of Lore
descr: Choose One - Draw 2 cards; or Restore 5 Health.
flavorText: Go ahead, carve your initials in him.

name: Oasis Snapjaw
flavorText: His dreams of flying and breathing fire like his idol will never be realized.

name: Frostwolf Grunt
descr: Taunt
flavorText: Grunting is what his father did and his father before that.   It\'s more than just a job.

name: Wild Pyromancer
descr: After you cast a spell, deal 1 damage to ALL minions.
flavorText: BOOM BABY BOOM!  BAD IS GOOD!  DOWN WITH GOVERNMENT!

name: Razorfen Hunter
descr: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 Boar.
flavorText: Someone did mess with Tuskerr once.  ONCE.

name: Twisting Nether
descr: Destroy all minions.
flavorText: The Twisting Nether is a formless place of magic and illusion and destroyed minions.

name: Malygos
descr: Spell Damage +5
flavorText: Malygos hates it when mortals use magic.  He gets so mad!

name: Millhouse Manastorm
descr: Battlecry: Enemy spells cost (0) next turn.
flavorText: "I\'m gonna light you up, sweetcheeks!"

name: Inner Fire
descr: Change a minion's Attack to be equal to its Health.
flavorText: Good idea: Buffing your minions.  Bad idea: Starting a conversation in the Barrens.

name: Soul of the Forest
descr: Give your minions "Deathrattle: Summon a 2/2 Treant."
flavorText: "Reforestation" is suddenly a terrifying word.

name: Bloodsail Corsair
descr: Battlecry: Remove 1 Durability from your opponent's weapon.
flavorText: Every pirate uses the same four digits to access Automated Gold Dispensers.  It\'s called the "Pirate\'s Code".

name: Tinkmaster Overspark
descr: Battlecry: Transform a minion into a 5/5 Devilsaur or a 1/1 Squirrel at random.
flavorText: Tinkmaster Overspark nearly lost his Tinker\'s license after the Great Ironforge Squirrel Stampede of \'09.

name: Ice Block
descr: Secret: When your hero takes fatal damage, prevent it and become Immune this turn.
flavorText: Ice is nice, and will suffice!

name: Brawl
descr: Destroy all minions except one.  (chosen randomly)
flavorText: Do you know the first rule of Brawl Club?

name: Vanish
descr: Return all minions to their owner's hand.

name: King Mukla
descr: Battlecry: Give your opponent 2 Bananas.
flavorText: King Mukla wanders Jaguero Isle, searching for love.

name: Truesilver Champion
descr: Whenever your hero attacks, restore 2 Health to it.
flavorText: It Slices, it Dices. You can cut a tin can with it. (But you wouldn\'t want to.)

name: Harrison Jones
descr: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's weapon and draw cards equal to its Durability.
flavorText: “That belongs in the Hall of Explorers!”

name: War Golem
flavorText: Golems are not afraid, but for some reason they still run when you cast Fear on them.  Instinct, maybe?  A desire to blend in?

name: Warsong Commander
descr: Whenever you play a minion with 3 or less Attack, give it Charge.
flavorText: The Warsong clan is such drama. It\'s really not worth it to become a commander.

name: Mana Wyrm
descr: Whenever you cast a spell, gain +1 Attack.
flavorText: These wyrms feed on arcane energies, and while they are generally considered a nuisance rather than a real threat, you really shouldn\'t leave them alone with a bucket of mana.

name: Savagery
descr: Deal damage equal to your hero's Attack to a minion.
flavorText: It is true that some druids are savage, but others still enjoy a quiet moment and a spot of tea.

name: Spiteful Smith
descr: Enrage: Your weapon has +2 Attack.
flavorText: She\'ll craft you a sword, but you\'ll need to bring her 5 Steel Ingots, 3 Motes of Earth, and the scalp of her last customer.

name: Shattered Sun Cleric
descr: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +1/+1.
flavorText: They always have a spare flask of Sunwell Energy Drink™!

name: Eye for an Eye
descr: Secret: When your hero takes damage, deal that much damage to the enemy hero.
flavorText: Justice sometimes takes the form of a closed fist into a soft cheek.

name: Azure Drake
descr: Spell Damage +1. Battlecry: Draw a card.
flavorText: They initially planned to be the Beryl or Cerulean drakes, but those felt a tad too pretentious.

name: Mountain Giant
descr: Costs (1) less for each other card in your hand.
flavorText: His mother said that he was just big boned.

name: Kor'kron Elite
descr: Charge
flavorText: The Kor\'kron are the elite forces of Garrosh Hellscream. Let\'s just say you don\'t want to run into these guys while wearing a blue tabard.

name: Jungle Panther
descr: Stealth
flavorText: Stranglethorn is a beautiful place to visit, but you wouldn\'t want to live there.

name: Baron Geddon
descr: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to ALL other characters.
flavorText: Baron Geddon was Ragnaros\'s foremost lieutenant, until he got FIRED.

name: Pit Lord
descr: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage to your hero.
flavorText: Mannoroth, Magtheridon, and Brutallus may be dead, but it turns out there are a LOT of pit lords.

name: Fiery War Axe
flavorText: During times of tranquility and harmony, this weapon was called by its less popular name, Chilly Peace Axe.

name: Mind Blast
descr: Deal 5 damage to the enemy hero.
flavorText: This spell blasts you directly in the MIND.

name: Timber Wolf
descr: Your other Beasts have +1 Attack.
flavorText: Other beasts totally dig hanging out with timber wolves.

name: Captain Greenskin
descr: Battlecry: Give your weapon +1/+1.
flavorText: He was this close to piloting a massive juggernaut into Stormwind Harbor. If it weren\'t for those pesky kids!

name: Elven Archer
descr: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage.
flavorText: Don\'t bother asking her out on a date.  She\'ll shoot you down.

name: Master Swordsmith
descr: At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +1 Attack.
flavorText: He\'s currently trying to craft a "flail-axe", but all the other swordsmiths say it can\'t be done.

name: Grommash Hellscream
descr: Charge.  Enrage: +6 Attack
flavorText: Grommash drank the tainted blood of Mannoroth, dooming the orcs to green skin and red eyes!  Maybe not his best decision.

name: Sea Giant
descr: Costs (1) less for each other minion on the battlefield.
flavorText: See?  Giant.

name: Doomguard
descr: Charge. Battlecry: Discard two random cards.
flavorText: Summoning a doomguard is risky. Someone is going to die.

name: Al'Akir the Windlord
descr: Windfury, Charge, Divine Shield, Taunt
flavorText: He is the weakest of the four Elemental Lords.  And the other three don\'t let him forget it.

name: Frothing Berserker
descr: Whenever a minion takes damage, gain +1 Attack.
flavorText: He used to work as an accountant before he tried his hand at Berserkering.

name: Power of the Wild
descr: Choose One - Give your minions +1/+1; or Summon a 3/2 Panther.
flavorText: Never look a panther in the eye.  Or is it \'Always look a panther in the eye\'?  Well, it\'s one of those.

name: Hellfire
descr: Deal 3 damage to ALL characters.
flavorText: It\'s spells like these that make it hard for Warlocks to get decent help.

name: Archmage
descr: Spell Damage +1
flavorText: You earn the title of Archmage when you can destroy anyone who calls you on it.

name: Reckless Rocketeer
descr: Charge
flavorText: One Insane Rocketeer.   One Rocket full of Explosives.   Infinite Fun.

name: Power Word: Shield
descr: Give a minion +2 Health. Draw a card.
flavorText: Sure the extra protection is nice, but the shield really reduces visibility.

name: Arcane Intellect
descr: Draw 2 cards.
flavorText: Playing this card makes you SMARTER.  And let\'s face it: we could all stand to be a little smarter.

name: Nourish
descr: Choose One - Gain 2 Mana Crystals; or Draw 3 cards.
flavorText: Druids take nourishment from many things: the power of nature, the songbird\'s chirp, a chocolate cake.

name: Angry Chicken
descr: Enrage: +5 Attack.
flavorText: There is no beast more frightening (or ridiculous) than a fully enraged chicken.

name: Mindgames
descr: Put a copy of a random minion from your opponent's deck into the battlefield.
flavorText: Sometimes it feels like this is all a game.

name: Leeroy Jenkins
descr: Charge. Battlecry: Summon two 1/1 Whelps for your opponent.
flavorText: At least he has Angry Chicken.

name: Gurubashi Berserker
descr: Whenever this minion takes damage, gain +3 Attack.
flavorText: No Pain, No Gain.

name: Windspeaker
descr: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Windfury.
flavorText: Is there anything worse than a Windspeaker with halitosis?

name: Force of Nature
descr: Summon three 2/2 Treants with Charge that die at the end of the turn.
flavorText: "I think I\'ll just nap under these trees. Wait... AAAAAHHH!" - Blinkfizz, the Unfortunate Gnome

name: Lightspawn
descr: This minion's Attack is always equal to its Health.
flavorText: Spawn of the Light? Or Pawn of the Lights?

name: Frost Elemental
descr: Battlecry: Freeze a character.
flavorText: When a Water elemental and an Ice elemental love each other VERY much...

name: Thoughtsteal
descr: Copy 2 cards from your opponent's deck and put them into your hand.
flavorText: "What do you get when you cast Thoughtsteal on an Orc?  Nothing!" - Tauren joke

name: Scavenging Hyena
descr: Whenever a friendly Beast dies, gain +2/+1.
flavorText: Hyenas prefer the bones of kodos or windserpents, but they\'ll eat pretty much anything.  Even Brussels sprouts.

name: SI:7 Agent
descr: Combo: Deal 2 damage.
flavorText: The agents of SI:7 are responsible for Stormwind\'s covert activities.  Their duties include espionage, assassination, and throwing surprise birthday parties for the royal family.

name: Prophet Velen
descr: Double the damage and healing of your spells and Hero Power.
flavorText: He\'s been exiled from his home, and all his brothers turned evil, but otherwise he doesn\'t have a lot to complain about.

name: Soulfire
descr: Deal 4 damage. Discard a random card.
flavorText: Are you lighting a soul on fire? Or burning someone with your OWN soul? This seems like an important distinction.

name: Ogre Magi
descr: Spell Damage +1
flavorText: Training Ogres in the art of spellcasting is a questionable decision.

name: Murloc Tidecaller
descr: Whenever a Murloc is summoned, gain +1 Attack.
flavorText: This guy gets crazy strong at family reunions.

name: Kirin Tor Mage
descr: Battlecry: The next Secret you play this turn costs (0).
flavorText: The Kirin Tor reside in the floating city of Dalaran.  How do you make a Dalaran float?  Two scoops of ice cream, one scoop of Dalaran.

name: Thrallmar Farseer
descr: Windfury
flavorText: He\'s stationed in the Hellfire Peninsula, but he\'s hoping for a reassignment closer to Orgrimmar, or really anywhere the ground is less on fire.

name: Frostwolf Warlord
descr: Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each other friendly minion on the battlefield.
flavorText: The Frostwolves are locked in combat with the Stormpike Expedition over control of Alterac Valley.  Every attempt at peace-talks has ended with Captain Galvangar killing the mediator.

name: Sorcerer's Apprentice
descr: Your spells cost (1) less.
flavorText: Apprentices are great for bossing around.  "Conjure me some mana buns! And a coffee!  Make that a mana coffee!"

name: Holy Fire
descr: Deal 5 damage.  Restore 5 Health to your hero.
flavorText: Often followed by Holy Smokes!

name: Mana Wraith
descr: ALL minions cost (1) more.
flavorText: They come out at night to eat leftover mana crystals. "Mmmmmm," they say.

name: Argent Squire
descr: Divine Shield
flavorText: "I solemnly swear to uphold the Light, purge the world of darkness, and to eat only burritos." - The Argent Dawn Oath

name: Ancient Watcher
descr: Can't Attack.
flavorText: Why do its eyes seem to follow you as you walk by?

name: Novice Engineer
descr: Battlecry: Draw a card.
flavorText: "Half of this class will not graduate… since they\'ll have been turned to chickens." - Tinkmaster Overspark, teaching Gizmos 101.

name: Stonetusk Boar
descr: Charge
flavorText: This card is boaring.

name: Ancestral Healing
descr: Restore a minion to full Health and give it Taunt.
flavorText: I personally prefer some non-ancestral right-the-heck-now healing, but maybe that is just me.

name: Conceal
descr: Give your minions Stealth until your next turn.
flavorText: Rogues conceal everything but their emotions.  You can\'t get \'em to shut up about feelings.

name: Arcanite Reaper
flavorText: No… actually you should fear the Reaper.

name: Raging Worgen
descr: Enrage: Windfury and +1 Attack
flavorText: If he\'s raging now, just wait until he gets nerfed.

name: Earthen Ring Farseer
descr: Battlecry: Restore 3 Health.
flavorText: He can see really far, and he doesn\'t use a telescope like those filthy pirates.

name: Onyxia
descr: Battlecry: Summon 1/1 Whelps until your side of the battlefield is full.
flavorText: Onyxia long manipulated the Stormwind Court by disguising herself as Lady Katrana Prestor.   You would have thought that the giant wings and scales would have been a giveaway.

name: Mana Addict
descr: Whenever you cast a spell, gain +2 Attack this turn.
flavorText: She’s trying to kick the habit, but still takes some mana whenever she has a stressful day.

name: Shiv
descr: Deal 1 damage. Draw a card.
flavorText: Rogues are experts at SHIV-al-ry.

name: Blood Knight
descr: Battlecry: All minions lose Divine Shield. Gain +3/+3 for each Shield lost.
flavorText: The Blood Knights get their holy powers from the Sunwell, which you should NOT bathe in.

name: Holy Smite
descr: Deal 2 damage.
flavorText: It doesn\'t matter how pious you are.  Everyone needs a good smiting now and again.

name: Holy Wrath
descr: Draw a card and deal damage equal to its cost.
flavorText: C\'mon Molten Giant!!

name: Ironforge Rifleman
descr: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage.
flavorText: "Ready! Aim! Drink!"

name: Bluegill Warrior
descr: Charge
flavorText: He just wants a hug.   A sloppy... slimy... hug.

name: Battle Rage
descr: Draw a card for each damaged friendly character.
flavorText: "You won\'t like me when I\'m angry."

name: Nightblade
descr: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to the enemy hero.
flavorText: Your face is the place you\'d probably least like a dagger, and where rogues are most likely to deliver them.

name: Youthful Brewmaster
descr: Battlecry: Return a friendly minion from the battlefield to your hand.
flavorText: His youthful enthusiasm doesn’t always equal excellence in his brews.   Don’t drink the Mogu Stout!

name: The Black Knight
descr: Battlecry: Destroy an enemy minion with Taunt.
flavorText: He was sent by the Lich King to disrupt the Argent Tournament.   We can pretty much mark that a failure.

name: Demonfire
descr: Deal 2 damage to a minion.   If it’s a friendly Demon, give it +2/+2 instead.
flavorText: Demonfire is like regular fire except for IT NEVER STOPS BURNING HELLLPPP

name: Redemption
descr: Secret: When one of your minions dies, return it to life with 1 Health.
flavorText: I am not sure how you get demptioned the first time.  It’s a mystery!

name: Lord Jaraxxus
descr: Battlecry: Destroy your hero and replace him with Lord Jaraxxus.
flavorText: "TRIFLING GNOME! YOUR ARROGANCE WILL BE YOUR UNDOING!!!!"

name: Cold Blood
descr: Give a minion +2 Attack. Combo: +4 Attack instead.
flavorText: "I\'m cold blooded, check it and see!"

name: Lightwarden
descr: Whenever a character is healed, gain +2 Attack.
flavorText: She’s smaller than her sisters Mediumwarden and Heavywarden.

name: Questing Adventurer
descr: Whenever you play a card, gain +1/+1.
flavorText: "Does anyone have some extra Boar Pelts?"

name: Kobold Geomancer
descr: Spell Damage +1
flavorText: In the old days, Kobolds were the finest candle merchants in the land. Then they got pushed too far...

name: Cenarius
descr: Choose One - Give your other minions +2/+2; or Summon two 2/2 Treants with Taunt.
flavorText: Yes, he\'s a demigod. No, he doesn\'t need to wear a shirt.

name: Tauren Warrior
descr: Taunt. Enrage: +3 Attack
flavorText: Tauren Warrior: Champion of Mulgore, Slayer of Quilboar, Rider of Thunderbluff Elevators.

name: Explosive Trap
descr: Secret: When your hero is attacked, deal 2 damage to all enemies.
flavorText: It traps your food AND cooks it for you!

name: Hogger
descr: At the end of your turn, summon a 2/2 Gnoll with Taunt.
flavorText: Hogger is super powerful. If you kill him, it\'s because he let you.

name: Cult Master
descr: Whenever one of your other minions dies, draw a card.
flavorText: She may be an evil cult master, but she still calls her parents once a week.

name: Wild Growth
descr: Gain an empty Mana Crystal.
flavorText: Grow your own mana crystals with this Mana Crystal Growth Kit, only 39.99!

name: Sprint
descr: Draw 4 cards.
flavorText: Rogues are not good joggers.

name: Master of Disguise
descr: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Stealth.
flavorText: She\'s actually a male tauren.  People don\'t call him "Master of Disguise" for nothing.

name: Druid of the Claw
descr: Choose One - Charge; or +2 Health and Taunt.
flavorText: Cat or Bear?  Cat or Bear?!  I just cannot CHOOSE!

name: Auchenai Soulpriest
descr: Your cards and powers that restore Health now deal damage instead.
flavorText: The Auchenai know the end is coming, but they\'re not sure when.

name: Bestial Wrath
descr: Give a Beast +2 Attack and Immune this turn.
flavorText: The seething wrath is just beneath the surface.  Beneath that is wild abandon, followed by slight annoyance.

name: Rockbiter Weapon
descr: Give a friendly character +3 Attack this turn.
flavorText: This would be real handy if your enemy is made of rock.

name: Starving Buzzard
descr: Whenever you summon a Beast, draw a card.
flavorText: If you feed him, he loses his whole identity.

name: Mirror Image
descr: Summon two 0/2 minions with Taunt.
flavorText: Oh hey it\'s Mirror Image! !egamI rorriM s\'ti yeh hO

name: Corruption
descr: Choose an enemy minion.   At the start of your turn, destroy it.
flavorText: It starts with stealing a pen from work, and before you know it, BOOM!  Corrupted!

name: Preparation
descr: The next spell you cast this turn costs (3) less.
flavorText: "Be Prepared" - Rogue Motto

name: Cairne Bloodhoof
descr: Deathrattle: Summon a 4/5 Baine Bloodhoof.
flavorText: Cairne was killed by Garrosh, so... don\'t put this guy in a Warrior deck.  It\'s pretty insensitive.

name: Mortal Strike
descr: Deal 4 damage.  If your hero has 12 or less Health, deal 6 damage instead.
flavorText: "If you only use one ability, use Mortal Strike." - The Warrior Code, Line 6

name: Flare
descr: All minions lose Stealth. Destroy all enemy Secrets. Draw a card.
flavorText: Not only does it reveal your enemies, but its also great for parties!

name: Silver Hand Knight
descr: Battlecry: Summon a 2/2 Squire.
flavorText: It\'s good to be a knight.   Less so to be one\'s squire.

name: Guardian of Kings
descr: Battlecry: Restore 6 Health to your hero.
flavorText: Holy beings from the beyond are so cliché!

name: Ancient Brewmaster
descr: Battlecry: Return a friendly minion from the battlefield to your hand.
flavorText: Most pandaren say his brew tastes like yak.  But apparently that\'s a compliment.

name: Young Dragonhawk
descr: Windfury
flavorText: They were the inspiration for the championship Taurenball team: The Dragonhawks.

name: Frost Shock
descr: Deal 1 damage to an enemy character and Freeze it.
flavorText: FROST SHOCK!

name: Healing Touch
descr: Restore 8 Health.
flavorText: 8 Health, no waiting.

name: Venture Co. Mercenary
descr: Your minions cost (3) more.
flavorText: No Job is too big.  No fee is too big.

name: Sacrificial Pact
descr: Destroy a Demon. Restore 5 Health to your hero.
flavorText: This is the reason that Demons never really become friends with Warlocks.

name: Bane of Doom
descr: Deal 2 damage to a character.  If that kills it, summon a random Demon.
flavorText: My advice to you is to avoid Doom, if possible.

name: Abomination
descr: Taunt. Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to ALL characters.
flavorText: Abominations enjoy Fresh Meat and long walks on the beach.

name: Flesheating Ghoul
descr: Whenever a minion dies, gain +1 Attack.
flavorText: \'Flesheating\' is an unfair name.  It\'s just that there\'s not really much else for him to eat.

name: Loot Hoarder
descr: Deathrattle: Draw a card.
flavorText: Always roll need.

name: Betrayal
descr: An enemy minion deals its damage to the minions next to it.
flavorText: Everyone has a price. Gnomes, for example, can be persuaded by stuffed animals and small amounts of chocolate.

name: The Beast
descr: Deathrattle: Summon a 3/3 Finkle Einhorn for your opponent.
flavorText: He lives in Blackrock Mountain.  He eats Gnomes.  That\'s pretty much it.

name: Flame Imp
descr: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to your hero.
flavorText: Imps like being on fire.  They just do.

name: Freezing Trap
descr: Secret: When an enemy minion attacks, return it to its owner's hand and it costs (2) more.
flavorText: "Dang, that\'s cold." - appropriate response to Freezing Trap, or a mean joke.

name: Southsea Deckhand
descr: Has Charge while you have a weapon equipped.
flavorText: Pirates are into this new fad called "Planking".

name: Bloodfen Raptor
flavorText: "Kill 30 raptors." - Hemet Nesingwary

name: Cleave
descr: Deal 2 damage to two random enemy minions.
flavorText: Hey you two…could you stand next to each other for a second…

name: Fen Creeper
descr: Taunt
flavorText: He used to be called Bog Beast, but it confused people because he wasn\'t an actual beast.   Boom, New Name!

name: Starfire
descr: Deal 5 damage.  Draw a card.
flavorText: Balance is important to druids.  This card is perfectly balanced.

name: Goldshire Footman
descr: Taunt
flavorText: If 1/2 minions are all that is defending Goldshire, you would think it would have been overrun years ago.

name: Ragnaros the Firelord
descr: Can't Attack.  At the end of your turn, deal 8 damage to a random enemy.
flavorText: Ragnaros was summoned by the Dark Iron dwarves, who were eventually enslaved by the Firelord.  Summoning Ragnaros often doesn’t work out the way you want it to.

name: Rampage
descr: Give a damaged minion +3/+3.
flavorText: Minion get ANGRY.   Minion SMASH!

name: Captain's Parrot
descr: Battlecry: Put a random Pirate from your deck into your hand.
flavorText: Pirates and Parrots go together like Virmen and Carrots.

name: Windfury Harpy
descr: Windfury
flavorText: Harpies are not pleasant sounding.  That\'s the nicest I can put it.

name: Stranglethorn Tiger
descr: Stealth
flavorText: The wonderful thing about tigers is tigers are wonderful things!

name: Circle of Healing
descr: Restore 4 Health to ALL minions.
flavorText: It isn\'t really a circle.

name: Snake Trap
descr: Secret: When one of your minions is attacked, summon three 1/1 Snakes.
flavorText: Why did it have to be snakes?

name: Cabal Shadow Priest
descr: Battlecry: Take control of an enemy minion that has 2 or less Attack.
flavorText: You never know who may be secretly working for the Cabal....

name: Upgrade!
descr: If you have a weapon, give it +1/+1.  Otherwise equip a 1/3 weapon.
flavorText: Easily worth 50 DKP.

name: Shield Slam
descr: Deal 1 damage to a minion for each Armor you have.
flavorText: "What is a better weapon? The sharp one your enemies expect, or the blunt one they ignore?" - The Art of Warrior, Chapter 9

name: Windfury
descr: Give a minion Windfury.
flavorText: Windfury is like Earthfury and Firefury, but more light and airy.

name: Nat Pagle
descr: At the end of your turn, you have a 50% chance to draw a card.
flavorText: Nat Pagle, Azeroth\'s premier fisherman!  He invented the Auto-Angler 3000, the Extendo-Pole 3000, and the Lure-o-matic 2099 (still in testing).

name: Houndmaster
descr: Battlecry: Give a friendly Beast +2/+2 and Taunt.
flavorText: "Who let the dogs out?" he asks.  It\'s rhetorical.

name: Water Elemental
descr: Freeze any character damaged by this minion.
flavorText: Don\'t summon a water elemental at a party.  It\'ll dampen the mood.

name: Eaglehorn Bow
descr: Whenever a Secret is revealed, gain +1 Durability.
flavorText: First Lesson: Put the pointy end in the other guy.

name: Archmage Antonidas
descr: Whenever you cast a spell, put a 'Fireball' spell into your hand.
flavorText: Antonidas was the Grand Magus of the Kirin Tor, and Jaina\'s mentor.  This was a big step up from being Grand Magus of Jelly Donuts.

name: Kill Command
descr: Deal 3 damage.  If you have a Beast, deal 5 damage instead.
flavorText: "Kill!", he commanded.

name: Mana Tide Totem
descr: At the end of your turn, draw a card.
flavorText: It is said that some shaman can say "Floatin\' totem" 10 times, fast.

name: Drain Life
descr: Deal 2 damage. Restore 2 Health to your hero.
flavorText: "I\'ve just sucked one year of your life away."

name: Doomsayer
descr: At the start of your turn, destroy ALL minions.
flavorText: He\'s almost been right so many times. He was sure it was coming during the Cataclysm.

name: Darkscale Healer
descr: Battlecry: Restore 2 Health to all friendly characters.
flavorText: Healing is just something she does in her free time.   It\'s more of a hobby really.

name: Shadowform
descr: Your Hero Power becomes 'Deal 2 damage'. If already in Shadowform: 3 damage.
flavorText: If a bright light shines on a priest in Shadowform… do they cast a shadow?

name: Frost Nova
descr: Freeze all enemy minions.
flavorText: Hey man, that\'s cold.  Literally and metaphorically.

name: Mirror Entity
descr: Secret: When your opponent plays a minion, summon a copy of it.
flavorText: "You go first." - Krush\'gor the Behemoth, to his pet boar.

name: Counterspell
descr: Secret: When your opponent casts a spell, Counter it.
flavorText: What\'s the difference between a mage playing with Counterspell and a mage who isn\'t?  The mage who isn\'t is getting Pyroblasted in the face.

name: Magma Rager
flavorText: He likes to think he is powerful, but pretty much anyone can solo Molten Core now.

name: Wolfrider
descr: Charge
flavorText: Orcish raiders ride wolves because they are well adapted to harsh environments, and because they are soft and cuddly.

name: Gelbin Mekkatorque
descr: Battlecry: Summon an AWESOME invention.
flavorText: He\'s the leader of the gnomes, and an incredible inventor.  He\'s getting better, too; He turns things into chickens WAY less than he used to.

name: Inner Rage
descr: Deal 1 damage to a minion and give it +2 Attack.
flavorText: They\'re only smiling on the outside.

name: Heroic Strike
descr: Give your hero +4 Attack this turn.
flavorText: Really, if you\'re a hero, this is every strike.

name: Doomhammer
descr: Windfury, Overload: (2)
flavorText: Orgrim Doomhammer gave this legendary weapon to Thrall.  His name is a total coincidence.

name: Tracking
descr: Look at the top three cards of your deck. Draw one and discard the others.
flavorText: For the person who just cannot decide what card to put in their deck!

name: Fireball
descr: Deal 6 damage.
flavorText: This spell is useful for burning things.  If you\'re looking for spells that toast things, or just warm them a little, you\'re in the wrong place.

name: Booty Bay Bodyguard
descr: Taunt
flavorText: You can hire him... until someone offers him enough gold to turn on you.

name: Scarlet Crusader
descr: Divine Shield
flavorText: Never wash your whites with a Scarlet Crusader.

name: Voodoo Doctor
descr: Battlecry: Restore 2 Health.
flavorText: Voodoo is an oft-misunderstood art. But it is art.

name: Shadow Bolt
descr: Deal 4 damage to a minion.
flavorText: It’s a Bolt.   Its made out of Shadow.   What more do you need to know!

name: Ethereal Arcanist
descr: If you control a Secret at the end of your turn, gain +2/+2.
flavorText: The ethereals are wrapped in cloth to give form to their non-corporeal bodies. Also because it\'s nice and soft.

name: Succubus
descr: Battlecry: Discard a random card.
flavorText: Warlocks have it pretty good.

name: Emperor Cobra
descr: Destroy any minion damaged by this minion.
flavorText: The Sholazar Basin is home to a lot of really horrible things. If you\'re going to visit, wear bug spray.  And plate armor.

name: Deadly Shot
descr: Destroy a random enemy minion.
flavorText: Accuracy is not a highly valued trait among the mok\'nathal.  Deadliness is near the top, though.

name: Claw
descr: Give your hero +2 Attack this turn and 2 Armor.
flavorText: The claw decides who will stay and who will go.

name: Explosive Shot
descr: Deal 5 damage to a minion and 2 damage to adjacent ones.
flavorText: Pull the pin, count to 5, then shoot.  Then duck.

name: Avenging Wrath
descr: Deal 8 damage randomly split among enemy characters.
flavorText: Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham! Wham!

name: Argent Protector
descr: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion Divine Shield.
flavorText: "I\'m not saying you can dodge fireballs.  I\'m saying with this shield, you won\'t have to."

name: Felguard
descr: Taunt. Battlecry: Destroy one of your Mana Crystals.
flavorText: Yes, he\'ll fight for you.  BUT HE\'S NOT GOING TO LIKE IT.

name: Northshire Cleric
descr: Whenever a minion is healed, draw a card.
flavorText: They help the downtrodden and distressed.  Also they sell cookies.

name: Leper Gnome
descr: Deathrattle: Deal 2 damage to the enemy hero.
flavorText: He really just wants to be your friend, but the constant rejection is starting to really get to him.

name: Fire Elemental
descr: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage.
flavorText: He can never take a bath. Ewww.

name: Snipe
descr: Secret: When your opponent plays a minion, deal 4 damage to it.
flavorText: A great sniper hits the spot.  Just like a delicious flank of boar. Mmmmm.

name: Southsea Captain
descr: Your other Pirates have +1/+1.
flavorText: When he saves enough plunder, he\'s going to commission an enormous captain\'s hat.  He has hat envy.

name: Bite
descr: Give your hero +4 Attack this turn and 4 Armor.
flavorText: Chew your food!

name: Defias Ringleader
descr: Combo: Summon a 2/1 Defias Bandit.
flavorText: He stole the deed to town years ago, so technically the town is his. He just calls people Scrub to be mean.

name: Harvest Golem
descr: Deathrattle: Summon a 2/1 Damaged Golem.
flavorText: "Overheat threshold exceeded. System failure. Wheat clog in port two. Shutting down."

name: King Krush
descr: Charge
flavorText: The best defense against King Krush is to have someone you don’t like standing in front of you.

name: Lorewalker Cho
descr: Whenever a player casts a spell, put a copy into the other player’s hand.
flavorText: Lorewalker Cho archives and shares tales from the land of Pandaria, but his favorite story is the one where Joey and Phoebe go on a road trip.

name: Hunter's Mark
descr: Change a minion's Health to 1.
flavorText: Never play \'Hide and Go Seek\' with a  Hunter.

name: Dalaran Mage
descr: Spell Damage +1
flavorText: You don\'t see a lot of Dalaran warriors.

name: Twilight Drake
descr: Battlecry: Gain +1 Health for each card in your hand.
flavorText: Twilight drakes feed on Mystical Energy.  And Tacos.

name: Coldlight Oracle
descr: Battlecry: Each player draws 2 cards.
flavorText: They can see the future.   In that future both players draw more cards.   Spoooky.

name: Molten Giant
descr: Costs (1) less for each damage your hero has taken.
flavorText: He gets terrible heartburn.  BECAUSE HE IS FULL OF LAVA.

name: Shadowflame
descr: Destroy a friendly minion and deal its Attack damage to all enemy minions.
flavorText: Start with a powerful minion and stir in Shadowflame and you have a good time!

name: Argent Commander
descr: Charge, Divine Shield
flavorText: The Argent Dawn stands vigilant against the Scourge, as well as people who cut in line at coffee shops.

name: Arcane Missiles
descr: Deal 3 damage randomly split among enemy characters.
flavorText: You\'d think you\'d be able to control your missiles a little better since you\'re a powerful mage and all.

name: Ancient of War
descr: Choose One - Taunt and +5 Health; or +5 Attack.
flavorText: Young Night Elves love to play "Who can get the Ancient of War to Uproot?"  You lose if you get crushed to death.

name: Stormwind Champion
descr: Your other minions have +1/+1.
flavorText: When Deathwing assaulted the capital, this soldier was the only member of his squad to survive. Now he\'s all bitter and stuff.

name: Swipe
descr: Deal 4 damage to an enemy and 1 damage to all other enemies.
flavorText: When a bear rears back and extends his arms, he\'s about to Swipe!  ... or hug.

name: Hex
descr: Transform a minion into a 0/1 Frog with Taunt.
flavorText: If you Hex a Murloc... it really isn\'t much of a change, is it?

name: Ysera
descr: At the end of your turn, draw a Dream Card.
flavorText: Ysera rules the Emerald Dream.  Which is some kind of green-mirror-version of the real world, or something?

name: Arcane Golem
descr: Charge. Battlecry: Give your opponent a Mana Crystal.
flavorText: Having Arcane golems at home really classes up the place, and as a bonus they are great conversation pieces.

name: Blood Imp
descr: Stealth. At the end of your turn, give another random friendly minion +1 Health.
flavorText: Imps are content to hide and viciously taunt everyone nearby.

name: Pyroblast
descr: Deal 10 damage.
flavorText: Take the time for an evil laugh after you draw this card.

name: Murloc Raider
flavorText: Mrrraggglhlhghghlgh, mrgaaag blarrghlgaahahl mrgggg glhalhah a bghhll graggmgmg Garrosh mglhlhlh mrghlhlhl!!

name: Spellbender
descr: Secret: When an enemy casts a spell on a minion, summon a 1/3 as the new target.
flavorText: While it\'s fun to intercept enemy lightning bolts, a spellbender much prefers to intercept opposing Marks of the Wild.  It just feels meaner.  And blood elves... well, they\'re a little mean.

name: Faerie Dragon
descr: Can't be targeted by Spells or Hero Powers.
flavorText: Adorable.  Immune to Magic.  Doesn\'t pee on the rug.  The perfect pet!

name: Sinister Strike
descr: Deal 3 damage to the enemy hero.
flavorText: There\'s something about this strike that just feels off.  Sinister, even.

name: Power Overwhelming
descr: Give a friendly minion +4/+4 until end of turn. Then, it dies. Horribly.
flavorText: We cannot even describe how horrible the death is.  It\'s CRAZY bad!  Maybe worse than that.  Just don\'t do it.

name: Arcane Explosion
descr: Deal 1 damage to all enemy minions.
flavorText: This spell is much better than Arcane Implosion.

name: Shadow Word: Pain
descr: Destroy a minion with 3 or less Attack.
flavorText: A step up from a spell cast by many beginning  acolytes: "Shadow Word: Annoy".

name: Noble Sacrifice
descr: Secret: When an enemy attacks, summon a 2/1 Defender as the new target.
flavorText: We will always remember you, "Defender!"

name: Dread Infernal
descr: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to ALL other characters.
flavorText: "INFERNOOOOOOOOOO!" - Jaraxxus, Eredar Lord of the Burning Legion

name: Naturalize
descr: Destroy a minion. Your opponent draws 2 cards.
flavorText: Another one bites the dust.

name: Wrath
descr: Choose One - Deal 3 damage to a minion; or 1 damage and draw a card.
flavorText: The talk around the Ratchet Inn is that this card is too good and should be a Legendary.

name: Secretkeeper
descr: Whenever a Secret is played, gain +1/+1.
flavorText: She promises not to tell anyone about that thing you did last night with that one person.

name: Dread Corsair
descr: Taunt. Costs (1) less per Attack of your weapon.
flavorText: "Yarrrr" is a pirate word that means "Greetings, milord."

name: Forked Lightning
descr: Deal 2 damage to 2 random enemy minions. Overload: (2)
flavorText: If you combine it with Spooned Lightning and Knived Lightning, you have the full dining set.

name: Hand of Protection
descr: Give a minion Divine Shield.
flavorText: This spell has been renamed so many times, even paladins don’t know what it should be called anymore.

name: Vaporize
descr: Secret: When a minion attacks your hero, destroy it.
flavorText: Rumor has it that Deathwing brought about the Cataclysm after losing a game to this card.  We may never know the truth.

name: Nozdormu
descr: Players only have 15 seconds to take their turns.
flavorText: Time to write some flavor text.

name: Divine Spirit
descr: Double a minion's Health.
flavorText: Double the trouble. Double the fun!

name: Armorsmith
descr: Whenever a friendly minion takes damage, gain 1 Armor.
flavorText: She accepts guild funds for repairs!

name: Murloc Tidehunter
descr: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 Murloc Scout.
flavorText: "Death will rise, from the tides!"

name: Tundra Rhino
descr: Your Beasts have Charge.
flavorText: Tundra rhinos are often mistaken for kodos. Or am I mistaken?

name: Summoning Portal
descr: Your minions cost (2) less, but not less than (1).
flavorText: NOT LESS THAN 1!  Don\'t get any ideas!

name: Hammer of Wrath
descr: Deal 3 damage.  Draw a card.
flavorText: A good paladin has many tools.  Hammer of Wrath, Pliers of Vengeance, Hacksaw of Justice, etc.

name: Stormwind Knight
descr: Charge
flavorText: They\'re still embarassed about "The Deathwing Incident".

name: Mad Bomber
descr: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage randomly split between all other characters.
flavorText: He\'s not really all that crazy, he is just not as careful with explosives as he should be.

name: Consecration
descr: Deal 2 damage to all enemies.
flavorText: Consecrated ground glows with Holy energy.  But it smells a little, too.

name: Knife Juggler
descr: After you summon a minion, deal 1 damage to a random enemy.
flavorText: Ambitious Knife Jugglers sometimes graduate to Bomb Jugglers.    They never last long enough to make it onto a card though.

name: Ice Barrier
descr: Secret: As soon as your hero is attacked, gain 8 Armor.
flavorText: This is Rank 1.  Rank 2 is Chocolate Milk Barrier.

name: Light's Justice
flavorText: Prince Malchezaar was a collector of rare weapons. He\'d animate them and have them dance for him.

name: Lava Burst
descr: Deal 5 damage. Overload: (2)
flavorText: It\'s like an ocean of liquid magma in your mouth!

name: Mind Control Tech
descr: Battlecry: If your opponent has 4 or more minions, take control of one at random.
flavorText: Mind Control technology is getting better, but that\'s not saying much.

name: Boulderfist Ogre
flavorText: "ME HAVE GOOD STATS FOR THE COST"

name: Priestess of Elune
descr: Battlecry: Restore 4 Health to your hero.
flavorText: If she threatens to "moon" you, it\'s not what you think.

name: Ancient Mage
descr: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions Spell Damage +1.
flavorText: Sometimes he forgets and just wanders into someone else\'s game.

name: Mark of Nature
descr: Choose One - Give a minion +4 Attack; or +4 Health and Taunt.
flavorText: Druids call it the "Mark of Nature."  Everyone else calls it "needing a bath."

name: Shadow Word: Death
descr: Destroy a minion with an Attack of 5 or more.
flavorText: If you miss, it leaves a lightning-bolt-shaped scar on your target.

name: Ironbeak Owl
descr: Battlecry: Silence a minion.
flavorText: Their wings are silent but their screech is... whatever the opposite of silent is.

name: Eviscerate
descr: Deal 2 damage. Combo: Deal 4 damage instead.
flavorText: There is a high cost to Eviscerating your opponent:  It takes a long time to get blood stains out of leather armor.

name: Repentance
descr: Secret: When your opponent plays a minion, reduce its Health to 1.
flavorText: Repentance often comes in the moment before obliteration. Curious.

name: Sunwalker
descr: Taunt. Divine Shield
flavorText: She doesn’t ACTUALLY walk on the Sun.  It\'s just a name.  Don’t worry!

name: Slam
descr: Deal 2 damage to a minion.  If it survives, draw a card.
flavorText: "Dun da dun, dun da dun": if you\'ve heard an ogre sing this, it\'s too late.

name: Sword of Justice
descr: Whenever you summon a minion, give it +1/+1 and this loses 1 Durability.
flavorText: I dub you Sir Loin of Beef!

name: Whirlwind
descr: Deal 1 damage to ALL minions.
flavorText: The way to tell seasoned warriors from novice ones: the novices yell "wheeeee" while whirlwinding.

name: Illidan Stormrage
descr: Whenever you play a card, summon a 2/1 Flame of Azzinoth.
flavorText: Illidan\'s brother, Malfurion, imprisoned him beneath Hyjal for 10,000 years.  Stormrages are not good at letting go of grudges.

name: Alexstrasza
descr: Battlecry: Set a hero's remaining Health to 15.
flavorText: Alexstrasza the Life-Binder brings life and hope to everyone.  Except Deathwing.  And Malygos.  And Nekros.

name: Silence
descr: Silence a minion.
flavorText: Reserved for enemy spellcasters, evil liches from beyond the grave, and karaoke nights at the Grim Guzzler.

name: Voidwalker
descr: Taunt
flavorText: No relation to "The Voidsteppers", the popular Void-based dance troop.

name: Flamestrike
descr: Deal 4 damage to all enemy minions.
flavorText: When the ground is on fire, you should not stop, drop, and roll.

name: River Crocolisk
flavorText: Edward "Lefty" Smith tried to make luggage out of a river crocolisk once.

name: Stormforged Axe
descr: Overload: (1)
flavorText: Yo, that\'s a nice axe.

name: Temple Enforcer
descr: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +3 Health.
flavorText: He also moonlights Thursday nights as a bouncer at the Pig and Whistle Tavern.

name: Imp Master
descr: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to this minion and summon a 1/1 Imp.
flavorText: She would enjoy the job a lot more if she just could get the imps to QUIT BITING HER.

name: Savage Roar
descr: Give your characters +2 Attack this turn.
flavorText: What do they roar? Nobody can quite tell, but it sounds like "Elephant Macho Breeze".  It\'s probably not that, though.

name: Innervate
descr: Gain 2 Mana Crystals this turn only.
flavorText: Some druids still have flashbacks from strangers yelling "Innervate me!!" at them.

name: Earth Elemental
descr: Taunt. Overload: (3)
flavorText: Nothing beats rock.

name: Faceless Manipulator
descr: Battlecry: Choose a minion and become a copy of it.
flavorText: The Faceless Ones are servants of Yogg-Saron, and they feed on fear. Right now they are feeding on your fear of accidentally disenchanting all your good cards.

name: Divine Favor
descr: Draw cards until you have as many in hand as your opponent.
flavorText: This is not just a favor, but a divine one, like helping someone move a couch with a fold out bed!

name: Demolisher
descr: At the start of your turn, deal 2 damage to a random enemy.
flavorText: Laying siege isn\'t fun for anyone.  It\'s not even all that effective, now that everyone has a flying mount.

name: Sunfury Protector
descr: Battlecry: Give adjacent minions Taunt.
flavorText: She carries a shield, but only so she can give it to someone she can stand behind.

name: Dust Devil
descr: Windfury. Overload: (2)
flavorText: Westfall is full of dust devils. And buzzards. And crazed golems. And pirates. Why does anyone live here?

name: Holy Light
descr: Restore 6 Health.
flavorText: If you are often bathed in Holy Light, you should consider wearing sunscreen.

name: Feral Spirit
descr: Summon two 2/3 Spirit Wolves with Taunt. Overload: (2)
flavorText: Spirit wolves are like regular wolves with pom-poms.

name: Raid Leader
descr: Your other minions have +1 Attack.
flavorText: "That\'s a 50 DKP minus!"

name: Amani Berserker
descr: Enrage: +3 Attack
flavorText: If an Amani berserker asks "Joo lookin\' at me?!", the correct response is "Nah, mon".

name: Ironbark Protector
descr: Taunt
flavorText: I dare you to attack Darnassus.

name: Deathwing
descr: Battlecry: Destroy all other minions and discard your hand.
flavorText: Once a noble dragon known as Neltharion, Deathwing lost his mind and shattered Azeroth before finally being defeated.  Daddy issues?

name: Stormpike Commando
descr: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage.
flavorText: The Stormpike Commandos are demolition experts.  They also bake a mean cupcake.

name: Silverback Patriarch
descr: Taunt
flavorText: He likes to act like he\'s in charge, but the silverback matriarch actually runs things.

name: Gladiator's Longbow
descr: Your hero is Immune while attacking.
flavorText: The longbow allows shots to be fired from farther away and is useful for firing on particularly odorous targets.

name: Elite Tauren Chieftain
descr: Battlecry: Give both players the power to ROCK! (with a Power Chord card)
flavorText: He\'s looking for a drummer.  The current candidates are: Novice Engineer, Sen\'jin Shieldmasta\', and Ragnaros the Firelord.
